fields.comment: Use this to create a relation between PhysicsJointMutator and a joint created by PhysicsJoint2Component. The PhysicsJoint2Mutator must exist when the physics objects are initialized for the first time.
fields.name: joint_id

fields.comment: if 1, the joint will break and this component will be destroyed.
fields.name: destroy

fields.comment: if != 0 and this is linked to a revolute joint, the joint motor will be enabled at this speed
fields.name: motor_speed

fields.comment: Private, don't touch this! Stores the joint's id in the physics engine.
fields.name: mBox2DJointId
